communications.subject: DC Freedom of Information Act Request: November 1, 2024 Accident Report
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the DC Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the PD-10 Accident Report OR any other publicly releasable records related to a bicycle-vehicle collision that occurred on the evening of November 1, 2024, at approximately 7:00 PM, at the intersection of Constitution Ave NW and 3rd Street NW in Washington, D.C (near 301 Constitution Ave). The CCN number for this accident is 24170107. I was present at the scene and, while not directly involved, I am seeking information and a narrative description on the incident to understand what occurred and to confirm the condition of the cyclist who was struck and the severity of the crash. I understand that certain details may be redacted due to privacy concerns, and I am requesting as much information as can be made available to a third party.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Patrik Adrián Szigeti
